thread.section_title: Timepiece Bank Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Timepiece Bank | timepiecebank.com
thread.title: John

author: John
title: John
text:
This is my first, but surely not last experience with Timepiece Bank.
Prior to this experience, I had no prior experience with Timepiece Bank.
I have wanted the Omega Dark Side of the Moon watch for sometime. The price was a bit more than I could justify spending on a watch. After looking around quite a bit, I saw a very attractive price through Timepiece Bank. My first reaction was skeptical and I was a bit concerned about buying such a nice watch without going through a secure transaction. However, the communication from the team, combined with the previous reviews etc, put me at ease.
I ended up traveling to Antwerp to personally pick up the watch. The location is very easy to get to from Central Station and the entire experience was seamless and a pleasure. The watch is exactly as expected with full 4 year warranty. I am a very happy customer.
